name: Bulldogs - Game 4
description:
Bulldogs

You play as a runner and your aim is to get to reach the end zone on the other side of the pitch without getting tackled by the bulldogs. Use speed, sidesteps, and strategy to be the last man standing.

How to Play

Move - W/A/S/D keys 

Sprint - Tap up arrow key 

Sidestep left/right - Tap Left/Right arrow key while moving

Quit to Main Menu - Esc 

Mute Music - M 

Mute Sound Effects - N

Project

This is game 4 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and check out my social media from the main menu or game description.
